title: Baixar Freecine APK – Installation, Streaming, and Download Issues
content:
I have been using Baixar Freecine APK to stream and download movies and TV shows, but recently, I have encountered multiple issues.

Installation Issues:

The APK file is not installing on my Android device.

It shows an "App Not Installed" error.

Sometimes, the app installs but crashes upon opening.

Streaming Problems:

Videos do not load properly, and buffering takes too long.

Some movies or TV shows display a "Content Not Available" error.

The app keeps disconnecting from the internet even when the connection is stable.

Download Failures:

Unable to download movies or TV series within the app.

Downloaded files do not appear in the device storage.

Some downloads stop midway and fail to resume.

I have tried basic troubleshooting steps like clearing the cache, reinstalling the app, and checking my internet connection, but the problem persists.

If anyone has a solution or knows an alternative app with similar features, please let me know. Any guidance would be appreciated!
creator: sadiv19679

title: Red Robin Website Not Working Properly on Firefox
content:
Whenever I try to access the [[Red Robin menu|https://theredrobinmenu.com/]] on Firefox, some parts of the website do not load properly. The food images are missing, and the navigation menu is sometimes unresponsive.

I have tried clearing my cache, disabling extensions, and using private browsing mode, but the problem still persists. Other browsers like Chrome and Edge seem to display the site correctly.

Is there any solution to fix this issue so I can browse the Red Robin menu without any problems on Firefox?

title: Impossibilità di aprire il mio sito
content:
Buongiorno, da stamattina quando cerco di entrare sul mio sito web (propertyhunter [.] ch) ricevo il seguente errore:

Codice di errore: MOZILLA_PKIX_ERROR_OCSP_RESPONSE_FOR_CERT_MISSING

Viene inoltre comunicato che il sito non è sicuro.

I sottodomini del mio sito ru.propertyhunter [.] ch e en.propertyhunter [.] ch sembrano non essere affetti da questo problema.

Inoltre non riscontro problemi di accesso utilizzando altri browser, il sito è bloccato solo da firefox.

Ho verificato i certificati su ssllabs.com e risulta che il grado di certificato è "A".

Il sito è su hostinger ed è sviluppato con WP Colibri builder (il dominio principale è con WP Colibri builder PRO, mentre i sottodomini sono sviluppati con la vrsione base) ed è basato su WordPress.

Non sono un tecnico per cui non ho la possibilità di intervenire sul codice.

title: Going to my Banks website to access statement
content: For 2.5 years I access my monthly bank statements from Alliance Bank on line, as I am currently on an extended stay out of Texas. This morning, I attempted to access my new statement and Firefox refuses to let me into the Alliance Bank website -- even though I've been going in there every month for about 30 months, at least once a month. Each time I try to go to the site, a warning comes up that it will NOT connect as this is not a secure connection as the security certificate is invalid due to being 'self-signed'. This is the same site I've gone to and done my banking for all this time, all with Firefox....can you please help me to disable this 'nanny' feature so that I can do my banking business per normal. SURELY..nothing has changed since I logged in last month...and them month before etc.. Thank you for your assistance, I am NOT at all tech competent.

title: How to delete an old Firefox account?
content: I recently created a new Firefox account using my new gmail address. When I try to sign in to the old Firefox account, I'm told I'll have to sign in using my "primary" account--presumably the new account. When I sign in to the new account, I only see an option to delete the new account, which I don't want to do, as I have Firefox Relay and passwords connected to it. title: Habilitar Plugin Java
content:
Boa Noite Estou tentando habilitar o Plugin Java no navegador Mozila para acessar os tribunais para consultas. Inicialmente fiz o seguinte procedimento:

Para habilitar o plugin Java no Firefox, pode seguir os seguintes passos: 

   Abri o Firefox    Selecionei a aba para acessar as "Ferramentas" e selecionar Complementos   Só que não achei a aba "Ferramentas" e consequentemente não encontrei a aba Complementos. Estou fazendo alguma coisa errada? Pode me ajudar?

Obrigado

Carlos O. Schneider Rio Grande do Sul - Brasil
